thread.title: Global economy: services PMIs slow in China, Japan

title: Global economy: services PMIs slow in China, Japan
text:
Global economy: services PMIs slow in China, Japan Wednesday, April 04, 2018 - 01:38 
China's services sector growth eased to a four-month low in March as new business and employment grew at a slower rate, while activity in Japan's service sector expanded at the slowest pace in 17 months. David Pollard reports.   
China's services sector growth eased to a four-month low in March as new business and employment grew at a slower rate, while activity in Japan's service sector expanded at the slowest pace in 17 months. David Pollard reports.  //reut.rs/2q41QTy
